After six months of chaos, charm, and countless oat milk lattes, we’re going to miss you more than we can say. You came in with a smile, a reusable cup, and a commitment to sustainability — but we all know your real motto was *“coffee first, sustainability second”* (and we’re not mad about it).

You were the person who brought calm to the storm of yarn samples, and who once spent *three hours* untangling a ball of recycled cotton with the patience of a saint and the determination of a superhero. You turned our mess into method, our confusion into clarity — and somehow made it look easy.

Thank you for the laughs, the lattes, and the little acts of kindness that made this place feel like a team, not just a workspace. We’ll miss your energy, your wit, and the way you always knew exactly what we needed — even when it was just a second cup of coffee.

Wishing you all the best in your next chapter. May it be as smooth as your lattes and as sustainable as your values (even if the latter sometimes takes a backseat to the former). 🌍✨

#FarewellSofie #OatMilkForever #UntangleTheTruth
